wikipedia_page.main: Harry Ernest Bowdler also known as Ernie Bowdler (1872 – 24 May 1921) was a Welsh footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 1 match on 18 March 1893 against Scotland.

response: * Ernie Bowdler (1872–1921), Shrewsbury Town F.C. and Wales international footballer
*Ernie Bowdler (1872-1921), Wales soccer international, was living at Villa Nova, Sutton Road, when he died.

link_mentions.page: List of Wales international footballers born outside Wales
